texts.name: Maeve
texts.biography: Brilliant but embattled, Maeve is a dedicated ruler working desperately to pull a doomed empire out of its downward spiral. Trying to salvage a future for the fragmenting Falcon Empire while fighting off a Demon invasion, Maeve has nothing to rely on but her own dedication to the ideals of chivalry and her unswerving faith in the worship of the Dragon of Light.

specialty.name: Haste
specialty.description: Casts Haste with effect increased by 3 for level 1–2 creatures, by 2 for level 3–4 creatures, and by 1 for level 5–6 creatures.
